prohibited_changes: No schema changes to core tables: users, jobs, memories, tenant_quotas, tenants (no ALTER/DROP on these)
No removal or signature change of core API endpoints: /health, /api/auth/login, /api/chat, /api/jobs, /api/jobs/:id, /api/memory/:filename, /api/workspace, /api/adapters/status
No removal of required env: DATABASE_URL, REDIS_URL, JWT_SECRET (API); API_URL (UI)
No hardcoded ports or URLs in core services

runtime_contracts_locked.health: GET /health returns { status, checks: { database, redis, websocket } }
runtime_contracts_locked.job_queue: Redis list job_queue; job payload JSON with id, message, status, created_at, updated_at
runtime_contracts_locked.api_bind: HOST env (0.0.0.0 in deployment); PORT env
